text:
Borut Pahor (; born 2 November 1963) is a Slovenian politician. He served as President of Slovenia since December 2012. He was Prime Minister from November 2008 to February 2012.
Pahor served several terms as a member of the National Assembly and was its chairman from 2000 to 2004. In 2004, Pahor was elected as member of the European Parliament.
